scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one black & white photograph, n.d., autographed, of a seated Thomas Dixon, Jr. (1864-1946), American novelist, playwright, and author of the script for the 1915 motion picture The Birth of a Nation,signed "fraternally Thomas Dixon Jr."
